base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with modern style.
part_description: Features two doors at the bottom, one drawer above. Handles centered on doors and drawer. Rectangular shape with flat top.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides horizontally, supported by internal rails. Doors swing open on hinges, revealing storage space. Handles provide grip for opening and closing. The drawer and doors are aligned vertically, with the drawer above the doors, allowing separate access to each compartment.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used for storage. People interact by opening doors and drawer to access contents. It can support items on its flat top surface, such as decorative objects or small appliances, enhancing functionality in a room.
